faq.setback: 5 feet street side yard, 10 feet street side yard if adjacent to a key lot
faq.corner-lot-rules: 3 feet max on the clear Vision Triangle is defined by the triangular area created by the diagonal connection of two points measured 25 feet along the back-of-curb (BOC) at the lot front and 75 feet along the BOC at the lot side.

articles.description: If you’re looking to get a new fence in California, it’s important to know about the laws surrounding fences and home improvement projects. Our post will go over some important things to keep in mind.

When it’s time to get a new fence it’s important to always use a reputable, licensed, and insured contractor.  In this post, we’ll go over the main reasons why you should always use a licensed and insured fence contractor.
When it’s time to replace your fence, you may be asking yourself what fence style is best for you and your property.
